question: Which of the following cricket teams has won the 2019 Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy?
explanation: Karnataka has won the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy for the first time. In the final, they  defeated Maharashtra by 8 wickets at the Holkar Cricket Stadium in Indore. With the win, Karnataka set a record of most number of wins in a row by an Indian domestic team as they won 14 T20 matches to lift the coveted T20 trophy. Karnataka also equaled Indian Premier League outfit Kolkata Knight Ridersâ€™ record of 14 consecutive wins.
